bibl.title: Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology. New York, 24-31 July 1980.
bibl.seg: Bagnall Roger S., Gerald M. Browne, Ann E. Hanson and Ludwig Koenen (Edd.), Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology. New York, 24-31 July 1980. (American Studies in Papyrology. 23.)
Chico, California, Scholars Press, 1981, 8°, xxix-706 pp., 23 figg.

C.R. par José O'Callaghan, StPap 22 (1983) pp. 53-57. - George M. Parássoglou, BibO 41 (1984) coll. 113-114. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 30 (1984) pp. 107-111. - Livia Migliardi Zingale, Iura 33 (1982) pp. 157-158. - Peter J. Parsons, JEA 71 (1985), Reviews Supplement, p. 64.
